edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.view.impl

Class InventoryMenuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.view.impl.InventoryMenuView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MenuView

    public class InventoryMenuView
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuView
    View class to display and receive inventory menu choices

    • Method Detail

      • displayMainMenu

        public void displayMainMenu()
        Display main menu options to user
        Specified by:
        displayMainMenu in interface MenuView

      • getMainMenuChoice

        public int getMainMenuChoice()
        Read the menu choice from the user

        Method will not return until a validate choice has been made

        Specified by:
        getMainMenuChoice in interface MenuView
        Returns:
        • 1 : Add an InventoryItem to the system
        • 2 : List all InventoryItems in the system
        • 3 : Edit an InventoryItem in the system
        • 0 : Exit the inventory menu

      • abortAdd

        public void abortAdd()
        Display abort message for adding InventoryItems

      • getIdInput

        public int getIdInput(boolean isNewItem)
        Prompt and get user input for an InventoryItem ID
        Parameters:
        isNewItem - set to true if the ID should be unused
        Returns:
        either a valid InventoryItem ID or #EXIT if the user wishes to abort the operation

      • getNameInput

        public java.lang.String getNameInput()
        Get user input for an InventoryItem name. Will not return until a nonempty string is input
        Returns:
        a valid InventoryItem name

      • getInfoInput

        public java.lang.String getInfoInput()
        Get user input for an InventoryItem description. Will not return until a nonempty string is input
        Returns:
        a valid InventoryItem description

      • getQuantityInput

        public int getQuantityInput()
        Get user input for the initial stock quantity for the InventoryItem
        Returns:
        the quantity for the InventoryItem

      • displayAllItems

        public void displayAllItems(java.util.List<InventoryItem> items)
        Display a list of InventoryItems
        Parameters:
        items - the InventoryItems to be displayed

      • abortEdit

        public void abortEdit(java.lang.String message)
        Display abort message for editing InventoryItems
        Parameters:
        message - optional detail message. Set to null for default message

      • itemNotFound

        public void itemNotFound(int idNum)
        Inform user that the desired InventoryItem could not be found
        Parameters:
        idNum - the ID of the InventoryItem being searched for

      • displayItem

        public void displayItem(InventoryItem item)
        Display information about an InventoryItem
        Parameters:
        item - the InventoryItem being displayed

      • displayEditMenu

        public void displayEditMenu()
        Display edit menu options to user

      • getEditMenuChoice

        public int getEditMenuChoice()
        Read the menu choice from the user

        Method will not return until a validate choice has been made

        Returns:
        • 4 : edit the id field
        • 5 : edit the name field
        • 7 : edit the description field
        • 6 : edit the quantity field
        • 0 : Exit the edit menu

      • confirmEdit

        public boolean confirmEdit(InventoryItem item,
                           InventoryItem updatedItem)
        Prompt user to confirm changes to an InventoryItem
        Parameters:
        item - the original version of the InventoryItem
        updatedItem - the updated version of the InventoryItem
        Returns:
        true if the user wishes to commit changes
